mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_review (gmt_create, answer_id, user_id, revi, reply_id, deleted) VALUES (#{gmtCreate}, #{answerId}, #{userId}, #{revi}, #{replyId}, False);
mapper.select: SELECT review_id, gmt_create, answer_id, user_id, IF(deleted = FALSE, revi, null) revi, reply_id, deleted FROM t_review WHERE review_id = #{reviewId};
